HighlightAdd.summary: The add() method of the interface adds a new object to a highlight, to be styled using the {{domxref("css_custom_highlight_api", "CSS Custom Highlight API", "", "nocode")}}.

remarks.para: Highlight is a -like object, so this is similar to using .

-{{domxref("css_custom_highlight_api", "The CSS Custom Highlight API", "", "nocode")}}
-CSS Custom Highlight API: The Future of Highlighting Text Ranges on the Web

HighlightAdd.returns: The Highlight object, with the added range.
